screen_desc: This is a screenshot of the Google Play Store showing the page of the "Expedia: Hotels, Flights & Car" app. There are options to uninstall or open the app. Below the app information, there are sections for ads suggested for the user, which include other apps like Airbnb and AccuWeather, and a "You might also like" section with app recommendations such as "Fasting - Intermittent Fasting" and "Wish: Shop And Save." At the very bottom of the screenshot is a section titled "About this app," suggesting additional details are available about the Expedia app.
action_think: The current screen shows the details of the 'Expedia: Hotels, Flights & Car' app on the Google Play Store. Per the user request, I need to navigate to the Spotify app within the Google Play Store. If Spotify is not installed, the user has instructed to install it. Once the app is either found or installed, the next step will be to navigate to its login screen. To search for the Spotify app, I should use the search functionality of the Google Play Store outlined by a magnifying glass on the top right corner of the screen.
action_plan: Tap on the search icon at the top right corner of the screen.
Type 'Spotify' into the search bar and then search.
If Spotify app is not installed, tap on the 'Install' button to install it; if it's already installed, tap on 'Open' button to open it.
Navigate to the Spotify login screen.
action_desc: Tap the search icon at the top of the screen.
action_result: By pressing the back button, I have navigated from the app details page for "Expedia: Hotels, Flights & Car" within the Google Play Store to the search bar with the app name still in the input field. This action has not made progress towards completing the user request, as the goal is to install and open the Spotify app, not to search for or interact with the Expedia app. The next required actions should involve navigating to the home screen or app drawer to locate Spotify, or going back to the initial search bar in the Google Play Store to search for and install Spotify if it is not already installed.
